name: Virtuexbank
tag_list: customer-loyalty, loyalty-programs, monetization, currency-monetization, saas, payment-gateway, virtual-goods, online-games, video-games, games, virtual-money, currency, money-transfer, exchange, coins, cash, credits, coupons, in-app-items, virtual-items,
overview:
Virtuexbank is an ESB (central hub) for virtual currency transfer.

Using our SaaS based platform, companies can now enable virtual currency exchange between them and thousands of other companies.

Why do this? Enhance average spending per customer & brand loyalty… How? Give us a call & we’ll explain with a short demo.

Our Vision: “To Be the innovator, disruptor & market leader in SaaS based virtual currency exchange loyalty programs ..”

The mutual platform for virtual currency exchange invites you to join hands with hundreds of other game developers, virtual world developers, social networks, and any other site deals in online transactions. We’re sector agnostic (just focusing on gaming industry for time being). So be it any sector do contact us to realign your monetization strategy & boosting your revenues.
